SqlOperation.Name: GetAll
GetAllExtended
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT j.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName, u.FullName as UserFullName, c.Name as ClusterName, p.Image as PackageImage FROM `job_job_tasks` j INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON j.WorkspaceId = w.Id INNER JOIN `idp_users` u ON j.UserId = u.Id INNER JOIN `clstr_clusters` c ON j.ClusterId = c.Id INNER JOIN `pkg_packages` p ON j.PackageId = p.Id WHERE j.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND j.`JobId` = @JobId ORDER BY j.Sequence ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: GetByIdOrSequence
GetExtendedByIdOrSequence
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT j.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName, u.FullName as UserFullName, c.Name as ClusterName, p.Image as PackageImage FROM `job_job_tasks` j INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON j.WorkspaceId = w.Id INNER JOIN `idp_users` u ON j.UserId = u.Id INNER JOIN `clstr_clusters` c ON j.ClusterId = c.Id INNER JOIN `pkg_packages` p ON j.PackageId = p.Id WHERE 1=1 {if:ById {AND j.`Id` = @Id} else {}} {if:BySequence {AND j.`Sequence` = @Sequence} else {}} AND j.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND j.`JobId` = @JobId;
